title: Proactive intelligence: monitor topics of interest
description: Owner said: 'An AI computer isn't passively waiting instructions. Anticipate what I'm interested in.' VSM should proactively monitor GitHub trending repos in AI/agents space, HN front page for relevant posts, and competitor releases. Run as a periodic task (daily or every few hours). Summarize findings and email owner only when something genuinely interesting surfaces. This is System 4 (intelligence/environment scanning) in Beer's model.
